translations.snvELky: You set up the interview within a few clicks or customize each question based on your preferences.
translations.snvEMD2: Replace your first round calls with automated language pre-screening.
translations.snvEOcl: Our software is using advanced data analyzing tools to get better results and recognize talent.
translations.snvEPvA: Our service helps you innovate and reduce the time to conduct interviews by up to 70%.
translations.snvEQM6: Our platform supports 28+ languages so you can test your candidate's language skills without having a native speaker in your team.
translations.snvERVM: We respect candidate's privacy and let them choose whether they want to use their camera or a microphone only.
translations.snvEYaQ: Please let us know and we will schedule a call to answer all of your questions and show you the platform.
translations.snvEjhT: Contact us and let's schedule a call.
translations.snvEvO3: Features that make our software unique
translations.snvEvss: Whether you are a small company, a recruitment agency, or huge cooperation, you can always benefit from our user-friendly pre-screening tool in order to invite the right candidates for a second-round interview.
translations.snvFSe6: Automated audio-screening tool designed for recruitment agencies that analyze soft skills.
translations.snvGx6l: Improve your image in front of your customers and candidates as well. Hiroo brings the following benefits:
translations.snvH5eO: Our platform gives you an opportunity to proceed more more job positions at the same time. Or working on one job position as a team.
translations.snvH6ru: No matter if the candidate submits the interview from home or from the train, no matter if he decides to use a smartphone or laptop, everything will be working as expected.
translations.snvH7Cd: Let technology analyze the content of the interview and you can make a decision based on your human feelings and experiences.
translations.snvH96i: Today's candidates are familiar with modern technologies and they will appreciate companies that are following modern trends.
translations.snvHa0Y: Our platform can provide enough information for you to make sure the candidate understands a language on the level you require.
translations.snvHbi0: You can offer to candidates a submitting the interview results by exporting them from our platform into a video. This may help you get interested in more candidates as they get a reward even if they won't get hired.
